title: Mummy Said the F-word
description: Bambino is a glossy, weekly parenting magazine aimed at 'yummy mummies'. Their ideal for motherhood always looks immaculate, never lets her children watch TV and only ever eats organic food. So when Cait, a chaotic single mother, becomes Bambino's agony aunt - she thinks she might be the single worst person to do the job.
author: Fiona Gibson
